input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
there were a lot of old buildings out in the countryside .
i had a great time touring all of them .
there were some old ruins as well .
my dog had a great time .
output.sentences: Our weekend vacation started with me taking a break.
The country had some beautiful buidlings.
While we toured, I got to snap some pictures of our time out here.
We got to see some ruins.
This dog was taking time to sniff around.
